title: Evaluation of cross-cultural competence among German health care professionals: A quasi-experimental study of training in two hospitals
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Patricia Beck, David Matusiewicz, Meryam Schouler-Ocak, Zohra Khan, Lisa Peppler, Liane Schenk
